field.name: Forced
field.summary: Shut down the database after the specified number of seconds; to shut down the database immediately, set the shutdown interval to 0.

field.name: DenyTransaction
field.summary: Deny new transactions and shut down the database after the specified number of seconds; if transactions are active after the shutdown interval has expired, the shutdown will fail; to shut down the database immediately, set the shutdown interval to 0.

field.name: DenyConnection
field.summary: Deny new connections and shut down the database after the specified number of seconds; if connections are active after the shutdown interval has expired, the shutdown will fail; to shut down the database immediately, set the shutdown interval to 0

overview.summary: Allow configuration of local or remote databases properties.

constructor.name: #ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of class.

method.name: SetSqlDialect(System.Int32)
method.summary: Sets the SQL dialect of the Firebird Database.

method.name: SetSweepInterval(System.Int32)
method.summary: Sets the number of transactions between database sweeps.
method.param: Sweep interval. To turn off database sweeps, set the sweep interval to 0.

method.name: SetPageBuffers(System.Int32)
method.summary: Sets the number of database page buffers.

method.name: DatabaseShutdown(FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.Services.FbShutdownMode, System.Int32)
method.summary: Make a sht down to a database.

method.name: ActivateShadows
method.summary: Activates a shadow file for database use.

method.name: SetForcedWrites(System.Boolean)
method.summary: Sets the write mode for the database.
method.param: true to enable forced writes mode; or false for disable it.

method.name: SetReserveSpace(System.Boolean)
method.summary: Configure the database to fill data pages when inserting new records, or reserve 20% of each page for later record deltas;
method.param: true to enable database to reserve space; or false for disable it.

method.name: SetAccessMode(System.Boolean)
method.summary: Set the access mode of the database.
method.param: true to set database in read only access; or false for read write access.
